TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SuggestionsAttributes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextService.SuggestionsAttributes HasRecommendedSuggestions = int32(4)

summary.para: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by : this tells that the text service thinks the result suggestions include highly recommended ones.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextService.SuggestionsAttributes InTheDictionary = int32(1)

summary.para: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by : this tells that the requested word was found in the dictionary in the text service.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextService.SuggestionsAttributes LooksLikeTypo = int32(2)

summary.para: Flag of the attributes of the suggestions that can be obtained by : this tells that the text service thinks the requested word looks like a typo.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextService.SuggestionsAttributes None = int32(0)
